comments.body: So this is what we don't want. Is there anywhere we are currently using the global Scheme with this api group already?

Well, anything that used componentconfig.KubeletConfiguraiton would expect to be able to use the global Scheme, as componentconfig was installed there. I'd bet that most, if not all, of that code is in the Kubelet though.

@mikedanese and I chatted offline and cleared up the confusion here. The correct solution is to have a scheme field on KubeletServer, and to register the kubelet api groups with that scheme, rather than using the existing global scheme or adding another global scheme. We'll do this in a subsequent PR.
